channel.title: [PI] A little addition to magic combat
channel.description:
I just thought of this really quick... What this does is the following: [i]When wearing the ring of Charos (4202) your maximum magic damage will be increased by 1% for every +10 magic attack bonus.[/i]
So for example: You're using Ice barrage and you have +131 magic attack bonus and you're wearing the ring of Charos. This means you will do 33 damage with the ice barrage (normally). However , you will receive a 13% extra damage bonus because of the offensive 131 magic attack bonus. This will give you a max hit of 37 instead of 33 with Ice Barrage in max mage gear.
This might be a fun little addition for the professional Hybrids on your server.
To add this , you must add a little piece of code in the [b]delayedHit[/b] and [b]playerDelayedHi[/b]t methods in your [b]CombatAssistant[/b] class.
Simply look for [code=java]} else if (c.projectileStage > 0) { // magic hit damage[/code]
in both of those methods and add this: [code=java] if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing] == 4202) { //is the player wearign the ring of charos? int magebonus = (int)Math.floor(c.playerBonus[3]/10); //get the damage bonus in % by doing magicAtkBonus/10 damage += (int)Math.ceil(damage*magebonus)/100; //add the extra % of damage to the original damage }[/code]
after this : [code=java] int damage = Misc.random(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[c.oldSpellId][6] + c.totalMagicBonus());[/code]
and that's it :D
